application:
```
---
### üîç Ek Baar Ye Bhi Dekh Lo (Choti magar moti baat): Aapne jo icons upload kiye hain, unme se kisi ke naam mein **Space** ya **Dash (-)** toh nahi hai? * **Sahi:** `ic_streekx_logo.png` * **Galat:** `ic streekx logo.png` ya `ic-streekx-logo.png`
---
### Ab Kya Karna Hai? 1. Upar wala `themes.xml` ka code copy karke GitHub par save kariye. 2. Codemagic par wapas jayein aur **"Start New Build"** daba dein.
Bhai, ye code maine bilkul clean likha hai, isme koi spelling ya structure ki galti nahi hai. Agar abhi bhi error aaye, toh mujhe bas us **Red line ka naya screenshot** bhej dena, main wahi khada hoon aapka APK banwane ke liye.
Kya main aapke liye `AndroidManifest.xml` ka pura sahi code yahan likh doon taaki aap direct copy-paste kar saken?
